text: OMG! I love it! I'm so glad I've got a sno biz 2 secs from the house!

name: Tadahshia Guyton aka Karson mom
text: Their always really nice! And the prices are great for what I get! keep up the great work ❤️ XoxoDaysha

name: Alona ÂÛ Farris
text: They're cheaper than I expected and really awesome. Plus, right beside a Sonic so the picky kid (or Mama, in my case 😆) that wants a cone or shake instead can be pleased too!!

name: andrea pope
text: There's nothing better than a sno biz in the summer!

name: Marsha Morgan
text: All the people our wonderful! Today’s was extremely great!

name: Stella Bailey
text: I have been here hundreds of times and every time it has been amazing.

resp.text: Thank you! This is what we strive for!

name: Matt McCracken
text: Greet staff! Always refreshing treat!

name: Steven Holt
text: Best place to be in Hamilton on a hot day. Or a cold one.

name: Scott Johnson
text: Great treat!

name: Danielle Emert
text: great place!!

name: Johnny Blaze
text: Great place

name: Barbara Swader
text: Many flavors of pops from which to choose.  Service was good. Short wait time. Indoor or outdoor seating.

resp.text:
Hi Barbara! Thank you for taking time to leave your thoughts;  we appreciate your positive feedback ~ our team works to keep wait time short, environment clean, and flavors fresh & varied.
In addition to seating, we also like to remind customers we have a drive-thru option too :)
Please pop by again soon ~ we look  forward to serving you fresh, frozen fun!

name: Max Moody
text: Great pops , plenty of flavors. Staff is friendly and helpful. Note: frios of Cullman is in their new location. Great place to come with friends.

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback! We're loving our new Clark Street location ♡

name: Ainsley Pres
text: The owners are nice but staff is rude. Popsicles are amazing but some of the other items taste like they were made about a month ago.

name: Sean Tankersley
text: I paid $6 for a small chocolate coffee shake and it tasted like a workout drink. Definitely water based with no milk. It tasted absolutely nothing like coffee at all and was very bland. Save your money and get Arby's.

resp.text:
Hi Sean. We agree - Arby's has a great shake.

And, you're correct! We do not have dairy-based protein smoothies; we have coconut milk sweetened with Stevia as "magic milk" base.  We use Ghirardelli chocolate powder & Ghirardelli syrup. Our mocha powder has 20g protein/scoop.

We certainly would have made you another option (probably recommending no protein powder). Hopefully there's something else you'd like to try - maybe a delicious pop? Our Cold Brew is a popular coffee-flavored pop. Next time you're downtown,  please introduce yourself to Pop Guy!

Thanks for taking time to provide your feedback. We value your opinion 🙂

name: Local 360
text: Good down to the last bight!

resp.text: 🤩 Appreciate your feedback! Each bite is made with TLC.

name: Zac Burks
text: Excellent customer service! Excellent desserts! Always friendly and great place to take your kid. Love Frios!

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty & taking a moment to leave feedback 🙂 Thank you!

name: mini mello
text: Incredible popsicles and nice staff.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to share your feedback. We agree...the gourmet pops are delicious & our popstars are wonderful ❣  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Elizabeth Espitia-Douglas
text: The shop is small but nice. There's tables for both adults and kids. The popsicles are really good. They have so much patience with rambus kids.

resp.text: We love kiddos...the children's zone is our favorite. Thank you for taking time to share your thoughts.

name: Holly McLeod
text: Awesome treats and awesome people!

name: Robert Thompson
text: Very nice and clean and great popsicles!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback 😊  We appreciate you!

name: Nikki Appleton
text: The Banana Pudding one is amazing!!!

name: Kelly Berry
text: Outstanding!!!

name: Emily Swanson
text:
I’ve been to this location multiple times never having a great experience but the last visit was the last time I’ll give my business to this location.
The girl working was not kind or helpful. I asked for the custard which she said “we are out.” Totally get that- but it’s what I came in for so I asked when it would be ready to serve which she came back with “I don’t know... not today though.” It was barely early afternoon.
I then asked about flavors in the case- which she said “honestly I don’t know what flavor it is- I would have to text my manager.” Not the most encouraging statement. I asked a few more questions but I could tell she was annoyed by my questions, so I picked a flavor quickly to just be done.
When she handed me the cup the custard was already melting over the sides- while I appreciated the generous helping, she stood and watched me as I cleaned up the mess she gave me along with what fell on the counter. No help or offer to help- just watching me struggle.
As a paying customer, I do expect to have some sort of kindness and helpfulness when I am giving you my business. I understand that it is “only $5 worth of custard” but some level of customer service instead of treating someone as an burden will get you a long way. I truly hope this location steps up on there employee training as this is not my first bad experience.

name: Suzanne Taylor
text: Liked it but would of liked to see them carry cherry flavor ice more.

name: Kirk Fogg
text: Disgusting, female shift manager is an idiot too. Did you know they take a metal stick with a flat spatula like head and dip it into chemical water to clean it, then would stick it back into the italian ice to soften it every hour? The machines are crusted with bacteria and germs too at the nuzzles for the frozen custard. These people are making others sick. Don't buy from here. Take it from a former employee. I worked there for one day. Was my last day too. Indian guy and his wife who own the store allow this. They should be sued. I for one may call the health department.

name: Kelly Grace
text: Being from up north we are huge Rita’s fans which is why we were excited to see a Rita’s in Dothan. However this must be one of the only Rita’s that doesn’t have chocolate or even the classic cherry water ice flavors. Hopefully they will get the classics!

name: Jessica Walker
text: I missed frozen custard when I moved back down here in the south. So proud we have a local shop now!! Its a bit pricey, but soooooo worth treating yourself!! The staff are super!!

name: Ms Melody Rhines
text: Great soft serve, (if they can keep the Ice Cream machine stocked with Vanilla) & competent employees 🤔

name: Ethan Cox
text: Really good Italian ice here! They have a large selection of flavors ranging from simply lemon to Hawaiian Punch. Great place to take you kids for a treat or for any dessert occasion! Bathroom is clean here too

name: Christopher Bartlett
text: Great Italian ice made fresh daily awesome stuff fast and courteous service parking lot not easy to get in and out of

name: T L
text: Love stopping here when we are in town. Great cool treat on a hot day.

name: natlya flowers
text: It was pretty good we had a great cashier

name: Amanda lynn
text: The watermelon jolly rancher flavor is amazing.

name: Josephine Scott
text: Didn't actually go here was at metro which is next door but I've heard it was a great place and it looked real nice.

name: Justin Kelley
text: Its ok, i cant get over the smell of a dirty mop when i go. The employees sometimes seems like they are out in left field.

name: Scott Bussey
text: Really good custard and ice. Definitely recommend

name: E F
text: I like that all of their Italian Ice is freshly made an Gluten Free! I now have a place to go to for desserts without the worry of allergies.

name: Lisa Ki
text: Great treats a little pricey but worth it..

name: Miranda Brown
text: Love love love Rita's they always have what I want

text: Love it! Has a variety of flavors and choices!😍
